name: MyCardio
0:
”Alexa open my cardio”
”What is the heart rate in Living Room?”
”What are the stats in Bed Room?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my cardio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The “My Cardio skill for Amazon Alexa" lets you ask your personal vital signs data in the privacy of your own home without the need for a wearable tracker, e.g. “Alexa, what are the vitals in Living Room?”

Cardio features real-time heart rate, respiratory rate, stress (heart rate variability) and motion when used with the Cardio sensor. 

Use command “Alexa, Open My Cardio” to start using the skill.

Ask “Alexa, what are the stats in Yoga Room?” to receive real-time heart rate, respiratory rate, stress (heart rate variability).

Ask Alexa for individual features, e.g. “Alexa, what is the heart rate in Office?” or “Alexa, what is Kitchen’s heart rate?”

A Cardio sensor by Advanced Telesensors is required to operate the “My Cardio skill for Amazon Alexa". Visit www.cardio.io for installation instructions in the accompanying Quick Guide.
